alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 9:06AM EST until January 03 at 4:10AM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Scott and Russell Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Hancock and Claiborne Counties. For the Clinch River...including Cleveland VA, Speers Ferry VA, Tazewell TN, NORRIS DAM, MELTON HILL DAM...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River At Cleveland VA. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding affects the pumping station for the water treatment plant. At 16.0 feet, Approximately 10 acres are flooded, including the ballpark. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Sunday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 15.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening to 12.2 feet and begin rising again tomorrow morning. It will rise to 13.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EST.
